Module Breakout.Clone
Package Objects

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
Objects.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrick, ClayBrick, GoldBrick, SteelBrick
public abstract class Brick extends Object
Brick class to create the bricks used for the brick wall in the game

    Brick.Crack
    Crack class to create cracks on the cement brick type when it is impacted by the ball

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick(String name, Point pos, Dimension size, Color border, Color inner, int strength)
      Creates a brick object with specified information
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the brick to specify its type
      pos - The point at which the brick is made
      size - The size of the brick
      border - The border color of the brick
      inner - The inner color of the brick
      strength - The strength of the brick

      Returns true if an unbroken brick has been impacted and broken or false otherwise
